name: Microservices Dev Environment
postCreateCommand: mvn -q -DskipTests package --file microservices/eureka-server/pom.xml && mvn -q -DskipTests install --file microservices/book-service/pom.xml && mvn -q -DskipTests package --file microservices/api-gateway/pom.xml && mvn -q -DskipTests package --file microservices/review-service/pom.xml && docker compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml down && docker compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
updateContentCommand: docker compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml down && docker compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
